drop_na.description: Drop rows that contain any null values in the         specified columns.

*cols.description:
A variable number of string arguments representing the column
names to check for null values.

drop_any_nulls.description: Drop rows that contain any null values in the         specified columns.

*cols.description:
A variable number of string arguments representing the column
names to check for null values.

drop_all_nulls.description: Drop rows where all values are null

*cols.description:
A variable number of string arguments representing the column
names to check for null values.

fill_nulls.description: Replace null (missing or empty) values in the specified columns with a given value.

*cols.description: One or more column names to replace nulls in.

val.description: The value to replace nulls with. Defaults to None.

nulls.description: The list of null values to replace. Defaults to [None].

raises.description:
If any of the specified column names are not found in the
DataFrame.
